main.name: Piyush Tiwari
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.aboutImageCaption: <   I use my brain so you don't have to ;)  />
about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.about: I am a Full-Stack developer based in Pune, India. I'm an final year student from University Institute of Technology, RGPV Bhopal, and my journey in web development began during my first year of college. I'm passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications, and I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. Love building projects. Currently I'm an SDE intern in Bajaj Finserv Health, Pune

desc: School sports caption
Selected twice for SGFI (School Games Federation of India)
Pursuing ECE Engineering course from RGPV University
Worked on integrated cirucits to make machines using c++ as programming language
Working on spring boot for delivering secure endpoints for integrating salesforce and other microservices of the organisation.

Migrated and re-designed the whole system to new and maintained apache HttpClient from spring boot’s conventional web client that resulted in better APM visibility as well as fixed memory leak issues upto 90%.
Developed a generic backend journey for partner policy issuance that is capable of generating more than 4000 policies in an hour.

Designed and engineered the new and maintained pub/sub model for listening and processing platform events generated from salesforce.This increased the uptime and efficiency by upto 40% and decreased memory consumption by almost 60%.
Skills: OOPS · Java · Spring boot · MongoDb · REST APIs · OAuth · Microservices
Worked on a fullstack educational chess platform that is designed to support the development of chess players of all ratings.
Restructured and developed the frontend by making it more interactive and user friendly,made several resusable and tested components for the frontend part.
I also modified and developed the backend apis for move verification and user authentication and integrated it throughout the project.Stack used: NextJS, ReactJS , StoryBookUI and Nodejs.
Worked on building the product from scratch and built multiple dashboards.
Skills: HTML · CSS · JavaScript · TailwindCSS · ReactJS · NodeJS · MongoDb · REST APIs · NextJs
Designed and developed the UI for project 'TILES' using ReactJS components.
Developed and integrated a real time Chat application in the project using Firebase.
Organized and created many reusable components for further expansion of the project.
Restructured and optimized their previous project 'Studios'.
Skills: HTML · CSS · JavaScript · MaterialUI · ReactJS
